messages.title: THE CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION IS SIMPLE.
messages.content: I live in the heart of the new Witham constituency with my family. I am an active member of our local community and like us all I share a passionate concern for the welfare of our country and our local communities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for our local Police Officers to combat anti-social behaviour and ensure our children are safe. Has worked with Essex Police to tackle crime and anti-social behaviour.
Working with residents to address local residentâ€™s road safety concerns and get some of our most dangerous local roads.
Listening to local concerns over the A12, the A120 and planning and delivering strategies that have an important and direct impact on the quality of life.

Campaigning for good local health care provision. Her focus with Witham constituency has been on local medical issues and ensuring residents can have confidence in the local NHS services which are vital for health & the treatment.
Meeting with members of the Essex NFU involved in Horticulture to discuss issues affecting the industry.

issues.brexitEurope: Taking back control of our neighbourhoods: Priti strongly backs the Conservative Party's policy of The People's Pledge campaign.
issues.health: Campaigning for good local health care provision.
issues.immigration: Taking back control of our neighbourhoods: Priti strongly backs the Conservative Party's policy of The People's Pledge campaign.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live in the heart of the new Witham constituency with my family. I am an active member of our local community and like us all I share a passionate concern for the welfare of our country and our local communities.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working on neighbourhood issues, addressing road safety concerns, and ensuring local health services are provided for.

contactInformation.address: Avenue Lodge, The Avenue, Witham, Essex, CM8 2DL

images.caption: Priti Patel working for all our communities.
